
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/longmaoxiansheng/p/18929351" title="发布于 2025-06-15 11:50">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">信奥一本通1073：救援</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1262583/202506/1262583-20250615114655067-968981757.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 14pt"><strong>&nbsp;思路分析</strong></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1262583/202506/1262583-20250615114824603-18873061.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>1、根据题意以及给出的输入输出画出如上坐标分析图，x坐标30，y坐标40,它们跟从大本营到屋顶之间刚好形成了一个直角三角形，而且通过坐标就很容易联想到勾股定理，已知三角形两条边就可以求出第三边。</p>
<p>勾股定理如下：</p>
<p>$a^{2}+b^{2}=c^{2}$</p>
<p>a边平方+b边平方=C边平方</p>
<p>$\sqrt{c}开根可得c边长$</p>
<p>将x坐标和y坐标带入公式可得到从大本营到屋顶之间的总路程平方，接着将总路程平方进行开根号即可得到c边的大小。</p>
<p>2、得到总路程就可以求得路上花费的时间:c/50=路上时间</p>
<p>根据题意每人上船需要花费1分钟，下船需要花费0.5分钟，所以</p>
<p>路上时间+上船时间+下船时间=救援该屋顶的总时间</p>
<p>3、所以根据题意，输入需要救援的屋顶，然后把去该屋顶救援所花的时间计算出来，再输入下一个救援屋顶，依次类推。当把所有救援屋顶都输入完毕之后也是救援总时间计算出来之时。最后输出总救援时间即可。</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> #include&lt;iostream&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">C++库文件</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> #include&lt;math.h&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">数学库文件
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 3</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 4</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">命名空间</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 5</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">using</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">namespace</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> std;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 6</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">主函数</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> main()
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">{
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 9</span>   <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">/*</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">n屋顶，x屋顶x坐标,y屋顶y坐标，
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">10</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">  z从大本营到屋顶的距离，r人数，
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">11</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">  fen从起点到屋顶上船下船的时间，ztime总时间</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">*/</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">12</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">double</span> n,x,y,z,r,fen,ztime=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">13</span> cin&gt;&gt;n;<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">输入救援屋顶数</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">for</span>(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> i=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>;i&lt;=n;i++<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">15</span>     cin&gt;&gt;x&gt;&gt;y&gt;&gt;r;<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">循环输入要救援的屋顶x坐标，y坐标，r人数</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span>   
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span>     z=x*x+y*y;<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">根据勾股定理求得从大本营到屋顶的总路程平方</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span>   
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">19</span>     z=sqrt(z);<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">开根总路程平方获得从大本营到屋顶的路程</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">20</span>   
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">21</span>     fen=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2</span>*(z/<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">50</span>)+r+r*<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0.5</span>;<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">计算去和回、上船、下船的时间</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">22</span>   
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">23</span>     ztime=ztime+fen;<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">加上每个屋顶救援用的时间</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">24</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">25</span> cout&lt;&lt;ceil(ztime);<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">输出总时间向上取整</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">26</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">27</span> }</pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>
